newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-SUMMARY IN THE SPANISH FIRST DIVISION.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-SUMMARY IN THE SPANISH FIRST DIVISION.

text.p: Summary of the game played in the Spanish first division on Monday. Barcelona 3 (Giovanni 13th, Gheorghe Popescu 40th, Juanito Rodriguez 45th) Extremadura 0. Halftime 3-0. Attendance 70,000.
